infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission11: Since the opening of the Abyssal Gate, many uninvited visitors have come to the shallow waters of the Abyss. We marked them from a distance during the last confrontation, and this time, the signal was detected inside the territory of The Sea of Miracles. So, warriors, with swords in hand, let's fight to the end!
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission11: Our land is not to be trampled on by any hostile creature.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission12: T.S.M is fighting in frontline Area 73 and has no time to worry about the safety of this area, but T.S.M guarantees a [reward] mk to the captain who kills these beasts.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission13: We have detected a swarm of large worms nearby and expect them to reach this outpost within five hours. Captain, please repel them, or we will all be buried in the ocean.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission13: We don't fear the worms anymore!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission14: !!! Emergency !!! T.S.M frontline observatory found some giant beasts quickly approaching this area, but the 日暮山 special-op assault squad is out on a mission, they cannot rush back in time. T.S.M is calling for heroic captains to stop disaster from happening and promising that the captain who can return alive will be rewarded with [reward] mk.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission14: It's incredible, you really made it, worthy of a legendary captain!
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission15: The storm gathering close, the submarine carried to the clouds
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission15: A school of hammerheads is endangering submarines travelling between [location1] and [location2]. They have swept away many outposts and are enthroned as a god in some areas. Captain, please attack and destroy them.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission15: Old gods fall, new gods rise.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission16: The Sea of Miracles has observed a group of Latchers advancing towards this area. We promise to reward the captain who repels them with [reward]mk.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission16: The impact not to take place
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission16: Captain, well done, you have protected this area once again.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission17: Captain, we have found in this area multiple crawler clans fighting for territory. They are interfering with inter-outpost navigation, so we sent down a squad to deal with them, but the contact was lost quickly. It's an emergency, so we decided to hire you to find the whereabouts of the lost soldiers and annihilate the threats - every one of them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission17: The crawlers' graveyard? No, our graveyard.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission17: We found our warriors in uniforms of The Sea of Miracles inside the stomachs of the crawlers. So young they were, yet they received treatment like soldiers, deployment like weapons, and burial like objects. In the end, they received no honor or praise which they deserved, or even a decent funeral.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission21: Test Subjects of Europa Magic and Biology Inc.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission21: The Europa Magic and Biology Inc. has donated a batch of modified mysterious creatures to East Asia Heavy Industries. However, during testing, the subjects escaped. We have previously sent the Higurashi Forces to suppress them, but the contact was lost immediately they encountered the subjects. Be aware, captain, these are not ordinary spinelings, so please handle them carefully.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission21: This mission must be kept confidential, or East Asia Heavy Industries will face heavy fines.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission23: The Europa Magic and Biology Inc. has issued a challenge. Their new test subjects are ready for use and they are recruiting captains undaunted by death to record and analyze the subjects' capabilities. If you make it back alive and triumphant, they will offer a generous reward.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission23: “The gods are mourning! Let me hear... who is wailing...”
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission23: The knell rings, but it is a salute to the opening of another world gate.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission24: A Broken Star, a Solitary Flame
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission24: EMBI has modified Subject T-044 based on data collected from the last combat and is currently recruiting crew members for the challenge. I wonder if you are interested.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission24: "The cry of the inferno echoes in the abyss, its angry roar resonating, the sharp whistling sound from its mouthparts filling the waters. The flames it spewed are still burning, and will keep burning...”
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission24: In the abyss, the inferno mourns, I am clad in armor, all were just a few sparks.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission25: EMBI has modified Subject 009 based on data collected from the last combat and is currently recruiting crew members for the challenge. I wonder if you are interested.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission25: "The poisonous fangs of Subject 009 have been pulled out. The decaying torch wanders in the abyss, corpses lay between layers of ice, but do not feel afraid, for our iron beast is blessing us."
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission25: In the ice, the plague sweeps, I hold my gun, there was nothing more than the ordinary.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission26: EMBI has modified Subject T-037 based on data collected from the last combat and is currently recruiting crew members for the challenge. I wonder if you are interested.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission26: "I will present to you my creation that surpasses the gods'."
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission26: In Europa, the thunder roars, our machine advances, and the defense line stands.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission31: While passing through this outpost, we heard that a group of mutated mudraptors are wantonly attacking submarines around. As travelling warriors, we must lend our help.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission31: We come from all corners of the world and go to all ends of it.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission32: We found fractal guardians in a cave, apparently still executing their last task - clearing the cave. The minerals in this cave are exactly what this outpost needs. The Sea of Miracles would have ignored this, but they paid us too much. So, what do you choose?
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission32: This is a story of one forsaken people destroying another.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission32: If I ever get a chance to leave Europa like whoever created these machines, I want to see the sunset and feel the seasons. I think she would wish the same.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission33: Peace did not last long after we expelled hammerheads from this region. Soon, a new group of native creatures came to occupy this lane. This time, we won't just drive them away: an example is to be made. Eradicate them! We will reward you handsomely.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission33: The blood spatters on the hull have not cooled down
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission33: More lives are lost at the point of guns
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission33: We have fought for peace in the area.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission34: Haha, guess what. We used miniaturizing weapons to shrink some latchers down, but they became too small and escaped the shackles. Captain, take care of them before they cause troubles!
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission34: Hopefully, one day I can have my long-cherished wish realized, cutting off all chains of karma.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission35: We detected a group of anomalous Molochs attacking ships traveling between [location1] and [location2]. Be aware, these Molochs are exceptionally aggresive, please be cautious!
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission35: The moloch group has been cleared.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission35: All targets neutralized, return to the base!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission36: Immigrants are flooding into the outpost, making it almost overcrowded. Therefore, we decided to open a new outpost. We scanned a alien ruin in a perfect position, but there are many guardians inside. We hope you can help us with them, the reward will of course not be an issue.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission37: We located the sub that attacked the "choirs", and it seems to have undergone a secondary mutation. According to information from Vila, this mutated worm seems to be the carrier of previously missing lieutenant, Brynhild. We're unclear about what happened during its disappearance, and no further information was transmitted from Vila yet. But no matter who or what the worm is, it will only cause greater destruction if left alone.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission38: A group of unwelcome guests has arrived in the channel, but it's clear that these creatures are not natural mutants. Alright sailors, it's time to clean up the trash, no matter whose work they are.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission38: First Appearance of the Albino Family
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission38: I stand in a fusion of water and blood. Above me streak meteors across the sky; below me lay bodies covering the seabed.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission41: A massive pulse interference has been detected in the area with severe vibration sensible across the shipping lane. Submarines passing by are advised to steer clear of this lane until The Sea of Miracles resolves the issue.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission41: A world-shattering change is upon us.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission41: I entrust the years to the abyss, letting it undulate beneath my steed. I excavate my own grave in my own eyes.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission42: There's a profession called whaleman on Earth, and there's also one on Europa, but with different whales. Sailors, proceed to the target area and hunt down the whales there.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission42: Congratulations on becoming a qualified whaleman.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission43: A few days ago, the Coalition's Dreadnought Fleet fell in this area. According to gathered information, they are still 'alive.' Our mission now is to ensure their true demise. Be cautious: this operation requires high maneuverability.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission43: The true Dreadnought Fleet should rest in the ship graveyard.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission44: Captain, this is a commission from the mining outpost. It's said that their mining ships were attacked by the mines themselves. I'm not sure how such an absurd statement came about, but please investigate.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission44: I feel that our misdeeds will eventually lead to our demise in this foreign land.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission45: We discovered two alien constructs driven by the brains of a pair of twins. I don't know how I feel about this kind of brain extraction, but it must have been cruel and inhumane. However, we have no capacity to pity these twins; the only thing we can do is to send them to their deaths and hope they will never reborn on Europa.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission45: The Operator, the Rioter, the Originator
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission45: Civilization and history weigh heavily on it.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission46: When wings turn into swimming fish, the curtain of invasion falls. They dwell in deep caves, guarding treasures like dragons. Their thunderous blasts resonate. This is their kingdom; entering it means starting a war.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission46: The victor is not who respects life and harmonic coexistence. When the final strike fell, the last guardians of the cave became nourishment for the sea, leaving nothing behind.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission47: Recently, people at the outpost discovered a new species of fish. Its meat is delicious and fetches a good price. However, most of them live in caves. Fishermen here are offering a bounty for someone to enter the caves and drive them out, which would allow for unobstructed fishing.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission47: A photograph was taken, documenting another achievement of the crew, another great victory of human over nature...
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission51: We lost contact with this outpost a while ago. Before that, a special cargo of eggs was delivered there. We suspect someone deliberately placed them at the outpost. Your mission is to clear everything that still moves at the outpost and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission51: The outpost has been cleared, leave the follow-up to us.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission51: The Sea of Miracles has found information about this cargo, but give us some time to decrypt it. We will find out who is behind this and make them pay.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission52: Captain, our submarine transporting genes... let me correct my self, our submarine transporting a choir was attacked by an unknown creature and sunk. Please search the area and retrieve important data on the wreck as soon as possible.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission52: Everyone sinks until they cannot sink anymore.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission52: Well done, Captain. The Sea of Miracles will give you further orders as soon as we decrypt the data. What a pity about these choir boys...
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission53: The music of death echoes in their ears, souls from the abyss climb into the outpost, nothing reflects from their turbid eyes. I feel like I've slept for a long time, but now I'm finally awake. (Clear all living creatures in the outpost and destroy the reactor)
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission53: There is no longer a soul inside the carcass, but the singing continues, she's still chanting...
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission60: All in the Name of Justice
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission60: The Sea of Miracles has blocked the lane between [location1] and [location2], but you're willing to take the risk...
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission60: Lives dissipate as blood disappears into water.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission60: “Now this is really not worth it...”
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission54: An elite squadron of the Coalition attacked and took over this outpost. They may launch a preemtive attack on any docked submarine. Eliminate them and destroy the reactor to claim the Separatists' bounty.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission54: Mission accomplished. Return to the submarine and contact the Separatists to collect your reward.
infotexts.tsm.a1: Hello, I am the captain of Peregrine Falcon Squad, The Sea of Miracles. We're overwhelmed with tasks and can't handle everything, so we're hoping for some assistance with certain matters, and of course, we'll pay for it!
infotexts.tsm.a2: The situation in The Sea of Miracles is not great. We were about to head to Kyushu Armory, but then commissions came up here. What's your opinion about finishing them for us?
infotexts.tsm.a3: Hello, I am the liaison officer from EMBI. We have posted a few commissions; are you interested in any of them?
infotexts.tsm.a4: Europa is vast, we love it in its immensity; time is long, we love it in its brevity; our lives are eager and fiery, deserving of living slowly, and also deserving of sudden death. This is a world where departure is common, but sadly, we're not good at goodbyes. Thus, before setting sail, the most important thing is to first be brave, then honest, and finally, believe in the existence of miracles! And, never forget each other...
I still have precious memories of Earth in my mind. The azure sky with gleaming stars, how beautiful the world was...
What is more important than wealth and glory in Europa is trust. Sailor, can I trust you?
Hi sailor, have you seen captain Eagle recently? No, I'm just asking. I think I left a toy duck in his locker before I realized it was stuffed with UEX...
Human beings are distinguished from animals because they have not only animal instincts but also free will and absolute spirituality. Do you want to live like a human or an animal, sailor?
infotexts.tsm.a5: What? You say you want to buy some slaves for your ship? Sorry, this is no longer a slave market. Slavery has been banned, so now we call it a talent market.
The 'summer' I spent with them was cruel indeed, so many people I'll never see again...
What paranormal event? Don't give me that nonsense about ghosts and goblins; the engine's tail flame can melt all ignorance and superstition.
We are now walking the path our predecessors have trodden. For them in another dimension, these are history, but for us, they are experiences.
infotexts.tsm.a6: Don't negate all the meetings and companionships just because everything ends in death and departure.
infotexts.tsm.a7: Hello I Kuiteman, I've sent the recent commissions to your terminal, thanks for your cooperation.
infotexts.tsm.a71: I guess you are kuiteman pig!
infotexts.tsm.a8: Hey, dude, welcome to our outpost. We've been having some trouble lately, can I ask you a favor?
infotexts.tsm.a81: Though he wears a clown mask, his flamboyant attire allows you to instantly recognize him as a bishop wanted by both the Coalition and TSM. Looking around, you decided to listen to what kind of favor he's going to ask.
infotexts.tsm.a82: I was heading to the next outpost, but the channel is blocked by The Sea of Miracles right now. I have something very important to do there, if... I mean, if you could help deal with them...
infotexts.tsm.a83: It would depend on how sincere you'd like to be.
infotexts.tsm.a84: Oh! My friend, I can be as sincere as you want me to be.
infotexts.tsm.a8a: You recognize him as a wanted man and handcuff him.
infotexts.tsm.a8b: "You asshole, do you know where you are! This is not the territory of your The Seditionists of Mendacity! Somebody, somebody!" The bishop yells over, and everyone around you leans toward you with all kinds of weapons.
infotexts.tsm.a8c: You have a bad feeling and are about to flee when an explosion goes off and the Coalition Riot Suppression Force invades from all over the place.
infotexts.tsm.a8d: While you're still in a daze, you hear from a walkie-talkie, "Empty the room, leave no one alive!"
infotexts.tsm.wait1: Let me wait a little longer.
infotexts.tsm.next1: Sorry about that, the price is still a bit high for you, come back next time.
infotexts.tsm.next2: You don't have enough money, should you take on some tasks to earn money?
infotexts.entitydescription.mvdxe: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.lldyj: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.hyddx: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.ddbm: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.AlbinismSpineling: Can be used to construct railgun shells or deconstructed into steel.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_soundplayer: Plays audio tapes obtained from creatures or purchased at outposts.
infotexts.entitydescription.Extra_hat_male_tsm: The last piece of conscience, the last balance of order
infotexts.entitydescription.suger_boardingaxe: ‖color:159,207,217,255‖Swing towards the enemy, and also towards one's former self.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.tsmmissions_Icarus: ‖color:159,207,217,255‖Suger's sidearm, a rotary pistol with integrated flashlight and grenade launcher, fires regular handcannon rounds. It was gifted by Commander Lerentine when Suger joined TSM, and has remained reliable through battles large and small. No one knows how a man of Suger's stature can single-handedly operate a pistol of this horrendously large caliber.\n\n“In mid-air, the wax of hypocrisy melted under the sun, and Icarus crashed into the sea”‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_advancedcomsuit: Low-oxygen alarm was damaged in combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_riotcontrolsuit: Low-oxygen alarm was damaged in combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_hdlcsuits: Low-oxygen alarm was damaged in combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_orangeconstant_o1: This suit was damaged in combat, with many functions disabled.
This suit was damaged in combat, with many functions disabled.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_orangeconstant_o3: This suit was damaged in combat, with many functions disabled.
infotexts.subcategory.tsmmissions: T.S.M. MISSIONS - The Sea of Miracles
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission1: T.S.M is fighting against the Beast at frontline position in Area 73 of The Aphotic Plateau and currently has no time left to protect the area, but the Beast is approaching and T.S.M promises a [reward] mk to anyone who kills the beast.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission1: People expect good news from you
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission1: T.S.M is looking forward to collaborating with you next time.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission2: T.S.M is fighting in frontline Area 73 and has no time to worry about the safety of this area, but T.S.M guarantees a [reward] mk to the captain who kills these beasts.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission3: !!! Emergency !!! T.S.M frontline observatory found some giant beasts quickly approaching this area, but the 日暮山 special-op assault squad is out on a mission, they cannot rush back in time. T.S.M is calling for heroic captains to stop disaster from happening and promising that the captain who can return alive will be rewarded with [reward] mk.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission3: It's incredible, you really made it, worthy of a legendary captain!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission4: T.S.M observed a group of Latchers coming towards this area, and we promised a reward of [reward] mk to the captain who repelled them.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission4: Well done, you have defended the area once again, captain.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission5: Europa Magic Biotechnology Inc.(EMBI) donated a batch of modified mystical creatures to 東亜重工 EastAsian-HeavyIndustry (EA-HI) , but EA-HI failed to contain them during testing, we had previously sent 日暮山 special-op assault squad over to suppress them, but lost the message after contact with the experiments, please be advised Captain, this is not ordinary bunch of giant spinelings! Please be very careful!
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission5: This mission must be kept secret or the EA-HI will face a hefty fine.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission6: We have heard a swarm of Moloch attacking traveling ships between [location1] and [location2]. This area is not under the jurisdiction of T.S.M, but for humanitarian reasons we promise to give [reward]mk to the captain that clears this bunch of creatures.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission6: The Moloch swarm has been eradicated.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission6: All monsters have been eliminated,navigate back now.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission7: Storms converge, lift me to the clouds
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission7: A large bunch of Hammerheads have threatened the safety of the passage between [location1] and [location2]. This Hammerhead sharknado has swept through many stations, and some people in the area have already been worshipping them as gods. So please, Captain, fire out and destroy them!
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission7: Their altars are erased by me.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission7: The fall of the old gods, the rise of the new ones.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission8: We have detected several large worms approaching the area and expecting to reach this station in 5 hours, Captain please repel them or we will all be buried in the cold currents.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission8: Target down, please return to the station ASAP.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission8: We are no longer afraid of the worms!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission9: Did you know that there is a profession called 'whaler' back on Earth, and there is also such a profession in Europa, but the whale is absolutely different. Well sailor, head to the target area and eradicate all cetacean creatures.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission9: Congratulations, you have become a certified whaler!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission10: Not long ago, a Coalition dreadnought fleet fell in the region, but according to the information gathered, they are still 'alive', now the task is to ensure that they are really dead. Please note that it better be a ultra-mobile operation.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission10: The real dreadnought fleet should sink in the ship cemetry.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission18: This station suddenly lost contact some time ago. Before that there had been a special shipment to this station, investigation shows it was some special eggs, so your task is to clean up this station of all living things and clean up all the eggs.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission18: The station has been cleared, leave the follow-up to T.S.M.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission18: T.S.M found the information of this shipment, but please give us some time to decrypt the data and we will find the person behind this.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission19: We drove away the hammerheads some time ago, but the area has not been peaceful for long, soon a new group of natives continue to dominate this channel, so this time we can not just drive them away, but to make them an example for others. I have to remind you may need to prepare some more anaparalyzant and calyxanide. Destroy this group of natives! We will give you a generous reward.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission19: Blood on our hands is not yet cold.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission19: Another soul perished because of us.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission19: This channel will finally be peaceful for a while.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission20: Europa Magic Biotechnology Inc.(EMBI) has issued a challenge, their new experimental subject is ready for use and they are recruiting brave crew members to test the strength of the new subject, then they will record the data during the battle. If someone survived to come back, they will provide a generous bonus.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission20: "Gods are mourning! Let me hear... Who is crying----"
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission20: The death knell had been rung, it's a salute to the opening door to another world.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission22: Hey, hey, guess what. We used a micro weapon to shrink some latcher, and since they got too small, they all got away, so the captain had to get to them quickly!
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission22: Will we tire of slaying endless beasts that hunt them
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmattack: 开始行动，交火规则：格杀勿论
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin1: 赏金任务：猎杀末日蠕虫
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin1: 在[location1]和[location2]之间的航道内有只末日蠕虫一直骚扰我们的运输，这次有人出价[reward]mk悬赏，任务目标就是击杀这只蠕虫
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin1: 恭喜你完成任务，悬赏奖励会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin2: 有一只女妖把[location1]和[location2]之间航道内当家了，不断骚扰附近站点和来往船只，所以我们出价[reward]mk买下这个女妖的头
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin2: 恭喜你完成任务，钱会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin3: 有一只外来捕勾占领了这个航道的深渊，让我们深渊开采作业难以进行，所以我们承诺如果有谁击杀了这只捕勾兽，将获得[reward]mk奖励
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin3: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin4: 赏金任务：猎杀赛博蠕虫
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin4: 我们的深渊勘探队在作业时，检测到附近类似于赛博蠕虫的声纳波形，所以他们发出悬赏，出价[reward]mk击杀这只赛博蠕虫，以保证深渊勘探的安全性
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin4: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，我们将继续在深渊进行勘探
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin5: 赏金任务：猎杀巨型脊刺群
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin5: 航道内的船只频繁失联，在查明原因后发现，原来是一群巨型棘刺从其他海域过来安家。这对我们航道安全产生了严重的危害，所以这次目标是这群棘刺
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin5: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，航道内再次进入平静的状态
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin6: 我们医院突然接到一批窒死中毒患者，根据抢救过来的船员回答，是在航行途中遭遇了毒蟒的攻击，为了大家安全，这群毒蟒必须死
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin6: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，我们不会再中窒死毒了
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin7: 赏金任务：迅猛龙阻击战
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin7: 大量迅猛龙霸占了原本安全的航道，并且威胁了周围站点安全，所以我们出价[reward]mk招募可以阻击这群迅猛龙的船队
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin7: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，阻击战完美完成
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin8: 赏金任务：黑色摩洛克歼灭战
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin8: 有群不长眼的船员在路过[location1]和[location2]的航道时，杀了几只摩洛克宝宝。这下一群黑色摩洛克占领了航道，没有办法只能征召勇士来帮忙解围
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin8: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，黑色摩洛克全部歼灭
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin9: 赏金任务：脱粒机族群剿灭战
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin9: 兹有一群虎尾煞盘踞在航道内，他们袭击过往附近站点，摧毁过往船只。之前有数名勇士前往讨伐，然皆未归。所以成功剿灭这群虎尾煞并安全返航的船队，可前往下个站点领取奖励
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin9: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，虎尾煞族群没有逃过剿灭
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin10: 赏金任务：异星人的宴请
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin10: 一支遗迹勘探队在勘探一座遗迹的时候，不小心放出几只守卫，这些守卫造成了严重的安全事故，所以我们需要有人去善后
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin10: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，但严格来说我们才是异星人
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin11: 赏金任务：洞穴里的野蛮人
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin11: 这次是画皮教派的发放的悬赏，他们有一些激进的成员在服用特制画皮卵后，抢劫了教派的画皮箱，并且逃到了一个洞穴内。所以教派希望有人去帮忙清理门户，并且摧毁那几个画皮箱
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin11: 恭喜你完成任务，[reward]mk会在你到达下个站点后发送到你账户，这强壮的体魄，低下的智力，到底是飞升成功还是失败了
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin13: 有几箱正在衰变的急需运往[location2]，注意！你只有十分钟的时间
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin14: [location2]中的一个富豪预定了一些高等皮革，这些皮革很珍贵，并且不能碰到水，碰到水就会坏，所以千万要小心运输
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin15: 运送被抓捕的降临派成员
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin15: 奇迹之海逮捕了几名降临派的成员，现在需要把他们运到下个站点进行审问
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin16: 一位神秘人委托我们运输一个包裹给另一个神秘人，并且他还透露这个包裹就是希洛克的宝藏（据说希洛克的宝藏，什么都有可能分解出来，不过全凭运气）
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin17: 奇迹之海委托我们运输一批矿石原矿
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin18: [location2]医疗物资紧缺，他们从奇迹之海订购了一批医疗物资，急需运送
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin19: 奇迹之海有一个小队的人，希望可以乘坐你们的船前往下个站点
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin20: 赏金任务：爬行者歼灭战
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin20: 在航道内有一大群爬行者，我们多次驱赶，但效果甚微。他们连站点安保力量都不怕，这已经不是一般的爬行者了，必须要出重拳
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission_origin20: 爬行者督促潜艇驾驶，训练船员的射击技巧，真是煞费苦心
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin20: 爬行者督促潜艇驾驶，训练船员的射击技巧，真是煞费苦心
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin21: 赏金任务：再见毁灭蠕虫
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin21: 沉寂在深渊的毁灭蠕虫再次活跃起来，周围站点都发布了紧急状态通知，搞得大家人心惶惶，所以有人出[reward]mk悬赏毁灭蠕虫
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_time1: 一箱衰变物资，保质期只有十分钟
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_water1: 一整箱的高质量皮革，如果进水了，就会导致损坏，小心点，这东西普通人可赔不起
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_shillok: 据说这个口袋里面什么都可能有，不妨分解出来看看，你能得到什么？
infotexts.faction.tsm.description: 奇迹之海公司逐渐演变为一个重要的阵营势力。凭借其广泛的影响力和资源，公司的角色不仅限于商业运营，还扩展到深海世界中的政治和军事领域，形成了一个强大的阵营，对深海探险和区域安全产生了深远的影响。
infotexts.faction.tsm.shortdescription: 奇迹之海是一家杰出的多领域企业。公司以其卓越的护航服务闻名，提供无与伦比的安全保障，确保深海探险者和商船的安全。
infotexts.randomnews35: 同舟共寄团队，正在清空航道内的威胁，联盟给予了正面的回复，并希望更多的团队加入其中，让航道可以更加安全。
infotexts.randomnews36: 奇迹之海为你保驾护航
infotexts.locationchange.tsm_city.changeto.abandon: 奇迹之海堡垒都市[previousname]被攻陷。
infotexts.locationchange.tsm_city.changeto.none: 奇迹之海堡垒都市[previousname]已经迁往其他更适宜居住的地方
infotexts.locationchange.none.changeto.tsm_city: 奇迹之海发现了生态区[previousname]，并建立了一座堡垒都市
infotexts.locationchange.abandoned.changeto.tsm_ci: 奇迹之海清扫了[previousname]的内部威胁，并以此为基础建立了一座都市
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgeneric.nomoney.tsm: “既然实力不行，也不打算缴纳保证金，那就不要打扰我宝贵的休息时间”
infotexts.lockedpathtooltiptsmreputation: 这条通道已经被奇迹之海封锁了，若想继续前进，你在‖color:faction.tsm‖奇迹之海的声望必须超过 [requiredreputation]，还需征得管理员的许可。你可以在在信息界面查看你当前的声望。\n\n当前声望: [currentreputation]
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathcoldcaverns.tsmc1:
“你们想通过这片关卡？”
管理员抬起头，眼神透过控制台的光幕打量了一番船队，随后熟练地操作终端，
“稍等，我先核对一下你们船队的记录。”
几秒钟后
“欢迎你，船长。经过核查，你们的声望足够，已授予你们前往木卫二海脊的通行权限，权限已同步到你们的终端。”
他停顿片刻，眼中掠过一丝严肃
“不过，木卫二海脊远比之前的航线更加凶险，深海暗涌、未知生物和残破的沉船都可能随时威胁你们的安全。船长，请务必保持冷静与谨慎。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathcoldcaverns.tsmc2:
“想要潜入更深的区域？”
管理员微微一笑，手指轻触终端，“稍等片刻，我需要调取你们的记录。”
几秒钟后，屏幕上的数据让管理员皱了皱眉，“抱歉，从现有的记录来看，你们尚未达到通过封锁的要求。”
“不过...”停顿了一下，视线从终端移向你们，语气带着些许玩味“这里可是奇迹之海，在这片海域，总有例外。如果你们执意要前往更深处，我们可以破例放行——前提是，缴纳2000mk的保证金。”
管理员靠在椅背上，目光中带着几分等待与考量，“现在，决定权在你们手上。你们的选择是什么？”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathcoldcaverns.tsmo1.ts: “很痛快嘛，我就喜欢这种性格的人，封锁线那边的人我会打好招呼，你们只管通过就好了。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathcoldcaverns.tsmo1.no: “没钱？唉，那我就没办法了，你们船队的记录并不让人称心如意，没钱的话考虑去悬赏那里赚一笔？
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathcoldcaverns.tsmo2.ts: “既然实力不行，也不打算缴纳保证金，那就不要打扰我宝贵的休息时间”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridge.tsmc1:
“你们想前往无光海原？”
“请稍等一下”管理员指尖在终端上飞速划过.
片刻后,管理员露出满意的笑容：：“看来你们一直在为我们开拓冰脊，做出了不少贡献。那么，我很高兴地宣布——无光海原的大门已向你们敞开。”
“愿你们在那片黑暗深海中一帆风顺，祝旅途平安，船长。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridge.tsmc2: “你们想进入海原？”\n管理员眯起眼，手指轻敲着终端，片刻后轻笑一声，“根据记录来看，这可不太好说啊……”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridge.tsmo1.t: “你们的记录不算差，但是否真的做好了准备，这片危险的海域可不会轻易接纳任何人。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridge.tsmo1.n: “钱不够呀，这样吧，我们最近也发布了几个赏金任务，要不试试看？”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridge.tsmo2.t: “去与不去，都是不是我们决定的，而是你们，毕竟木卫二海脊很适合居住，不是吗？”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathaphoticplateau.tsmc1: “啊，是你们啊！你们现在可是明星船队呢，木卫二到处都在传出你们的事迹呢”\“当然，当然，这意味着你们已获得通过无光海原的资格，现在可以动身前往浩瀚汪洋了。如今这种局势，能穿越到那里的船队屈指可数。”\n管理员站起身和你握手，“我会立刻通知前方的关卡，允许你们进入渊洋。愿你们在那片深不可测的海域中顺利前行。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathaphoticplateau.tsmc2: “很抱歉”\n管理员叹了口气，神情中透出一丝无奈:“我知道你们一路走到这里并不容易，经历了不少艰难险阻。但我们不能冒险放任一艘未达标的船队进入浩瀚汪洋。”\n他抬起头，语气变得柔和了些许:“这是为了保护你们。希望你能理解，不是所有人都能承受那里潜藏的危险。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathaphoticplateau.tsmo1: “按我们的规定，确实是可以放行的，”他缓缓说道，语气中带着一丝慎重\n“不过，我还是得劝你们三思。浩瀚汪洋可不是人人都能轻易踏足的地方。”他凝视着你们，声音低沉却意味深长\n“那片海域隐藏着无尽的未知与危险，不是所有人都能从中归来。请务必慎重考虑。”
“钱不够就不要逞能，更何况钱也不是万能的，先保住命再说吧“
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathaphoticplateau.tsmo2: “我就是说嘛，又不一定非要过去，无光海原多好，宜居，奇迹之海的总部就在无光海原，不如买一套公寓，退休养老吧”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgreatsea.tsmc1: 管理员老远看见你过来，他站了起来握住你手说到：“你看看，这谁来了，这不是无人不知道无人不晓的大明星船队嘛，这次来是有什么要求吗？”\n在听到你们想要前往热液废土的请求后，管理员的表情微微一僵。他沉默了片刻，随即语气沉缓地说道：“下个区域的生物数量异常丰富，加上地热活动引发的水流变化，航行将会变得更加危险。”他注视着你们，仿佛在确认你们的决心。“你们真的想好了吗？”\n他站直了身体，郑重地向你们敬了个礼。“那么，请务必小心，大意不得。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgreatsea.tsmc2: “所以你想进入热流废土？想过去的船队不少，失联的也不少，这是奇迹之海的保证金制度，如果你们执意要去的话，看看吧”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgreatsea.tsmo1: “17000马克？这好说，我等下就把钱转过去”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgreatsea.tsmo1.tsmc1: “不要着急啊，可以再考虑考虑。唉，这年头有人用命赚钱，有人用钱换命，我还是第一次见花钱送死的。”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgreatsea.tsmo1.nomon: “那就别去了，有钱有命才能花，有命总会有钱的”
infotexts.eventtext.unlockpathgreatsea.tsmo2.tsmc1: “好多人本来会跟你一样，可以站在这里，拥有一往无前的勇气”
infotexts.npctitle.tsm_outpost_combat_npc: 奇迹之海日暮山作战部
infotexts.npctitle.tsm_bountyhunter: 奇迹之海赏金任务派发员
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_marlboro_cigar: Man always remember love because of romantic only\n可缓慢治疗精神压力、精神病以及谵妄中毒
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_marlboro_box: 抽万宝路更有男人味\n内含8根万宝路香烟
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_Chinese_cigar: 每一口中华尽显尊贵品质\n可快速治疗精神压力和精神病，并且给予精神压力抗性
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_Chinesecigar_box: 鲜明个性,典雅风范,中华之美\n内含6根中华
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_universe_cigar: 木卫二超人的第一选择\n可快速治疗精神压力和谵妄中毒
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_universe_box: 抽宇宙牌，做木卫二人\n内含6根宇宙牌香烟
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eyi_relics: 本不属于这个世界的产物,或许需要异常事务收容箱来收容
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_virusstage_inhibit: 用于抑制血肉胚胎的生长防止进入下一阶段，但是并不能完全根治
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_virusstage_clear: 能够直接清除身体内的血肉胚胎，但是会对身体造成伤害。
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_virusstage_deep_in: 用于强效清除恶疫（血肉胚胎二阶段），代价是会对身体造成大量伤害。
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eyi_stabilise_reag: 稳定态：在你体内沉睡，如果体内被注入活体恶疫则会加速转化过程\n奇迹之海研发针对人体增强的常态，不同阶段会有不同的效果
不知道何处来的辅助剂，也不能确定他是作为增加还是减少恶疫常态来使用的
不知道何处来的辅助剂，也不能确定他是作为增加还是减少恶疫常态来使用的
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eyi_stabilise_add_: 稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:255,110,0,255‖增加1‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:255,110,0,255‖增加2‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:255,110,0,255‖增加3‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:255,110,0,255‖增加4‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eyi_stabilise_dimi: 稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:0,255,110,255‖减少1‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:0,255,110,255‖减少2‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:0,255,110,255‖减少3‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
稳定辅助剂，每次使用会‖color:0,255,110,255‖减少4‖color:end‖的稳定恶疫常态
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_walkman: 随身听，可以播放从BOSS身上获得到的音频磁带，又或者是站点购买的。
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_suger: 阿糖的幻化器，可以变化成阿糖的模样
infotexts.entitydescription.suger_combat_uniform: 使用一种十分结实的防弹合成纤维来保护脆弱部位，但为了不影响穿戴者的灵活性做了大量裁剪。奇怪的是这套装备包含一件老船长夹克，它看上去又大又旧，用suger的解释来说，它意味着“责任与担当
infotexts.entitydescription.suger_clothes: 阿糖休息时经常穿的一款连帽衫，轻便舒适
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_grey_pupils: ‖color:221,106,29,255‖莱伦汀的配枪,使用手炮子弹\n据说是当初她还在先进作战部中的一个小队队长的配枪，当时他们在受到伏击后，队长为了救她自己中弹身亡。之后她捡起了这把枪，戴上队长的头盔，发号施令。\n"噩兆天子"，大家这么叫她，她是奇迹之海的孩子，是你被死亡笼罩时的最后救星。‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_common_uniform: 九州作战部配发的常服，但是女款
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_lerentine: 莱伦汀的幻化器，可以变化成莱伦汀的模样
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_identifier: 奇迹之海内部常见的识别码，可以要求奇迹之海后勤部门为你提供各种服务
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_pgcflare: '记住求助的感觉，呼叫奇迹之海'\n\n使用方式：扔出去，耐心等待即可。(只存在一巡回)
infotexts.entityname.tsm_wz_cl_flare: 矿物物资投放舱指示器
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_wz_cl_flare: 扔出后，奇迹之海会受到信号，并根据坐标投放物资补给舱
infotexts.entityname.tsm_wz_yl_flare: 医疗物资投放舱指示器
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_wz_yl_flare: 扔出后，奇迹之海会受到信号，并根据坐标投放医疗补给舱
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_replenishme: 奇迹之海常见的物资补给箱，分解后会随机获得各种常见的矿物\n这些可都是才从矿井内打包发出来的，你嫌少我还嫌少呢
奇迹之海常见的物资补给箱，分解后会随机获得各种常见的矿物\n这些可都是才从矿井内打包发出来的，你嫌少我还嫌少呢
奇迹之海常见的医疗补给箱，分解后会随机获得各种医疗物资\n加急！加急！前线兄弟们还等着救命！
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_suit_O5: 你的第二层皮肤，包裹着力量与自信
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_gendarmerie_unifor: 奇迹之海的宪兵制服，主要维持部队纪律，保障部队命令的执行
infotexts.entityname.tsm_advancedcombatsuit: 损坏的军用先进防护服
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_advancedcombatsuit: 大部分外部装甲受到了破坏，只能抗住5000米的水压了。
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_orangeconstant: 这件防护服在战斗中损坏了，很多功能都失效了，耐压抗性只有5000米
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_rz_2a: 与2号B型不同的是，他并没有自带武器，仅仅只是作为一个全覆式外骨骼使用
infotexts.entityname.lm_rapidreaction_helmet: 联盟快速反应部队头盔
infotexts.entityname.lm_rapidreaction_vest: 联盟快速反应部队防弹衣
infotexts.entityname.lm_rapidreaction_uniform: 联盟快速反应部队战斗服
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_rz_pirent_m: 盗窃者们，在袭击奇迹之海货运船后得到戎装2号A型，并按照自己的想法改装
infotexts.talentdescription.suger_tail_handle: 当你身着幻化器时，你将长出猫耳猫尾。
infotexts.talentname.tsm_ai_outpost: 奇迹之海稳定恶疫常态
infotexts.talentdescription.tsm_ai_outpost: 改变部分dna序列，让身体排斥外来寄生。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsm_eyi_attack: 你体内的恶疫为稳定状态，他会持续为你的战斗提供加成
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsm_stress_resista: 你的意志此时非常坚定，可以抗住其他东西对你的精神的摧残
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsm_stress: 你现在感觉很紧张，很痛苦
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsm_eyi_provocativ: 你被腐烂的躯体咬过，现在你受到的撕裂伤和咬伤会增加，并且敌人会更容易以你为目标
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsm_virusstage: 恶疫病毒正在把你的身体当作培养场，宿主的基因被强行改造来与破皮者相匹配
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsm_virusstage_dee: 宿主的基因已经被改造，这种情况基本上不可逆转，他的身体正在发生变化
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.tsm_virusstage_de: 我逆流而上，你宛在水中央
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.tsm_virusstag: 我逆流而上，你宛在水中央
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_monster: 你感觉身上的骨头断了/n此时你受到的撕裂和咬伤都将增加
infotexts.afflictionname.tsmmission_ai_mod_resista: 奇迹之海日暮山稳定恶疫常态
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_ai_mod_: 改变部分dna序列，让身体排斥外来寄生。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_0_1: 在此阶段，你将会免疫水压，不需要氧气，最大生命值提高30%，并且不再会药物成瘾，烧伤迅速恢复，会迅速治疗血肉胚胎以及画皮
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_1_4: 在此阶段，你将不会需要氧气，并且获得30%游泳速度
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_4_8: 在此阶段，你将获得对所有毒物的免疫
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_8_1: 在此阶段，你将免疫6213米的水压，并且缓慢治疗缺氧。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_16_: 在此阶段，你将快速治愈身上的出血与失血
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_22_: 在此阶段，你将获得30%的物理伤害抗性
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_28_: 在此阶段，你将获得10%的远程武器攻速加成以及减少20%扩散
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_33_: 在此阶段，你将获得50%的眩晕抗性和烧伤抗性
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_37_: 在此阶段，你将缓慢治疗物理伤害和烧伤
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_39_: 在此阶段，你将获得50%酸性烧伤抗性，并且身上的阿片类中毒、戒断、成瘾，酒精中毒，精神病，画皮，酸性烧伤会缓慢自愈
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_42_: 在此阶段，你将获得25%的攻击力，50%近战打击力度，10%炮台攻击速度
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_44_: 在此阶段，你将55%的出血抗性
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_48_: 在此阶段，你将免疫5112米水压
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_55_: 在此阶段，你所有技能等级+18，维修速度增加44%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_59_: 在此阶段，你将获得30%近战攻速，20%移动速度，40%眩晕抗性
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_63_: 在此阶段，你将获得30%伤害抗性，30%最大生命值
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_65_: 在此阶段，你将获得对缓慢治疗所有毒的能力。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_69_: 在此阶段，你能从眩晕中更快起来，增加百分之30%攻击力，5%远程攻击速度
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_72_: 在此阶段，你将永远不死
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_76_: 在此阶段，你制作物品速度增加150%，制作等级+2
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_83_: 在此阶段，你将免疫6177米的水压，并不需要氧气。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_85_: 在此阶段，你将获得25%物理伤害和烧伤抗性，获得25%攻击力加成
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_90_: 在此阶段，所有对你的治疗效果将增加100%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tsmmission_eyi_95_: 在此阶段，你的身体部分dna序列发生改变，开始排斥外来寄生
infotexts.locationdescription.tsm_city: 奇迹之海旗下最大的都市，人来人往，比较全面的设施以及服务。
infotexts.locationdescription.tsm_mine: 奇迹之海旗下矿物开采地，可以深入到矿洞里采矿
infotexts.locationdescription.tsm_military: 奇迹之海旗下的军事瓮城
infotexts.loadingscreentip: 去试试东方潜渊行动组
infotexts.entityname.tsm_touhou: 联动内容-东方潜渊行动组
